How to buy an Air Cooler ?
Top 10 Air Coolers Brands in India
Search the product to add
Select a product from search suggestions

Preface

Air coolers are also popular as swamp coolers. This stand out as one of the most economical yet effective cooling solutions for indoor areas. Dissimilar to air conditioners that rely on their power-consuming water cooler compressor and refrigerants, air coolers follow the natural process of evaporation to reduce the overall air temperature. This is a rather eco-friendly and energy-efficient way of cooling the room simultaneously. And that can be presumed as the reason why when temperatures start to soar, people start looking for a new air cooler.

How does an Air Cooler work?

The single most important principle of air coolers is evaporative cooling. Let's understand the functioning of an air cooler;
Water Evaporation: Air coolers come fitted with a water tank and water pump that circulates water into cooling pads.
Air Distribution: These pads are arranged in a way that the water retention and air exposure is at maximum.
Heat Suction: As and when the hot air goes via the cooling pads, the water evaporates which in turn sucks up the heat from the air in this process.
Cool Air Flow: The moistened and cooled air is then let out in the room which brings down the humidity and rising temperatures.
The natural cooling procedure saves a lot of energy and works very well in dry weather where levels of humidity are lower.

Kinds of Air Coolers

Depending upon the needs Air Coolers are available in many types, and each type of air cooler has its need in different kinds of environments
Personal Air Cooler: This is a compact version of an air cooler and is perfect for compact spaces and personal use. It's portable and easy to carry, and usually in bedrooms, study rooms, or small office spaces. The most preferred choice for people who buy this type of cooler is a 12v portable air conditioner cooler which is not only portable but also powerful.
Desert Air Cooler: A perfect fit for larger rooms, office spaces, etc and it comes with an impeccable cooling capacity along with the ability to hold more water due to larger tanks. Great cooling choice for open spaces.
Tower Air Cooler: Tower Air Coolers are tall and sleeker and look very pleasing to the eyes, and also they do not take up much space. A great type of cooler for the rooms where space is limited. Many brands such as Symphony, Bajaj, Havells, Orbit, Dyson, Orbit, Godrej, etc make some of the best cooling tower fans.
Window Air Cooler: As the name suggests, it is installed on Windows. The window air cooler pulls in cool air from the outdoors and is perfect for rooms that have big enough window.
Industrial Air Cooler: Ideal for industrial and commercial use. These coolers are sturdy and come with strong airflow and massive water tanks. These coolers are aimed at cooling large spaces for instance warehouses, workhouses, and factories.

Advantages of Air Coolers

Enhanced Air Quality: The process of absorbing air via water soaked pads can be of great help in clarifying dust and pollutants, offering cleaner air. Moreover, the hiked humidity can be of some advantage in dry environments. A lot of reviews online for symphony cloud 15 and a few other models from other prominent brands.
Power Efficient: Air coolers are much power efficient in contrast with the air conditioners, hence turning out as a economical cooling solution, particularly in areas where the temperature is hot and humid.
Easy on Wallet: In contrast with the air conditioners Air Conditioners air coolers are much economical and far easy to maintain. While some constantly look for the best cooler under 5000 and if they are very lucky with their research whether online or offline they will bag a wonderful air cooler under 3000. Nevertheless any electronic product is good as long as it's safe, does the job and does not punch a hole in your wallet.
Eco Friendly: Unlike air conditioners air coolers do not use refrigerants and it does not emit greenhouse gasses, thereby making it more eco friendly.
Easy Installation and Movability: Majority of the air coolers are portable and do not need a professional installation to start functioning, thereby making it easy to install and move from one place to another. The personal air coolers, however, are easy to install and movable.

Final Words

Looking for a more practical and environment friendly cooling solution? Go no further as an Air Cooler is just the thing you need. They are energy saving and economical, and convenient to operate, thereby making them a go to option, especially in dry climate, as also one of the key factors that play a role in purchase decision is the overall power consumption of a cooler. Considering the various types of air coolers and understanding the factors like climate, size of room and add-on features, you can determine the perfect cooler depending upon your need. If maintained from time to time it will function perfectly, offering the comfortable and refreshment one looks for in their homes. If you don't want to pay up a lump sum amount opt for a cooler on emi.

Frequently Asked Questions

Which Air Cooler is Best?

The most common and favored air cooler is the Desert Air Cooler, that is ideal for places where the humidity is less and temperature soars high. Air Coolers have cooling capacity based on the water tank size which can be 12 liters, 15 liters, 20 liters, 50 liters, 80 liters, 200 liters, etc and so on

How do I choose the right air cooler for my room?

Choose an air cooler based on the size of your room, the local climate, and your cooling needs. Look for the cooling capacity, water tank size, airflow, and additional features like remote control and air purification.

What is the difference between an air cooler and an air conditioner?

Air coolers use evaporative cooling and are more energy-efficient and eco-friendly, but are less effective in humid climates. Air conditioners use refrigerants to cool the air and are more powerful, but consume more energy and are more expensive to operate.

Do air coolers use a lot of electricity?

Air coolers are generally more energy-efficient than air conditioners, consuming significantly less electricity. They can be a cost-effective cooling solution, especially for extended use.

Can Air Coolers run without water?

Waterless air coolers are available in the market but they still need a little amount of dampness and it can come from ice. So simply the answer here is NO. As it happens that an air cooler cannot run in water's absence. One of the most important components in an air cooler requires water to run without which it is impossible for the cooler to provide cooling. And thats the reason why it is deemed as a water cooler ac.
